metadata.title: CVE-2017-12618 apr-util: Out-of-bounds access in corrupted SDBM database (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: Apache Portable Runtime Utility (APR-util) 1.6.0 and prior fail to validate the integrity of SDBM database files used by apr_sdbm*() functions, resulting in a possible out of bound read access. A local user with write access to the database can make a program or process using these functions crash, and cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 is installed
jbcs-httpd24-apr-util is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
